OOC:  Hi Airly, remember me?

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: July 31, 2002 11:58:18 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: MegatroN

Perceptor:::

Percepto finished his work and walked towards the contro room


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> "All this work is getten' on my nerves" Quickstrike mumbled as he=20
> made his way to the control room "You called?"
>=20
>=20
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor:::
> >=20
> > "Yes, boss" replied the male.
> >=20
> >=20
> >=20
> >=20
> >=20
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > ooC: Sorry peeps, I've been out of it for the last few days...=20
I=20
> > > need someone to kick me... several times. Maybe too much=20
watching=20
> > of=20
> > > anime is eating away at my brain... naw, you can never watch=20
too=20
> > > much anime. lol =3Dp
> > >=20
> > > -- Megatron / Switchblade --
> > >=20
> > > Megatron catches the comm message, and replies, "I'll check on=20
it=20
> > > later. When you're done, come to the countrol room. Megatron=20
> out."=20
> > >=20
> > > He stops for a second, then opens a commlink to Quickstrike who=20
> > > should have finished fixing the storage bay by=20
now. "Quickstrike,=20
> > > where are you right now? Come to the control room if you've=20
> > finished=20
> > > your last task."
> > >=20
> > > Megs closes that comm, and opens another, this time to Proto=20
and=20
> > > Destructor, "Proto, Destructor come to the control room."
> > >=20
> > > He closes the commlink and then sits back in his=20
chair. "Hmmm...=20
> > > base defenses are insufficient, I must find some way to deal=20
with=20
> > > Galvatron, and a counter offensive attack at either the Tripred=20
> > > base, or the Maximal base." the Pred leader thinks out loud to=20
> > > himself.
> > >=20
> > > -----------------------------
> > >=20
> > > Switchblades CR chamber nears completion of his repairs. Due to=20
> the=20
> > > sever damage however, some of the fixing would need to be done=20
> > > manually by Switchblade himself.
> > >=20
> > >=20
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Perceptor::
> > > >=20
> > > >=20
> > > > Perceptor opened commlink with MEgatron "Boss, the auto=20
> defences=20
> > > > sistems are almost done... if you desires see how it fuction=20
it=20
> > be=20
> > > > ready in 13 cycles "
> > > >
